name: City Life is Small
title: Smallest Major City Population
description: In 2024, the largest city in Bosnia and Herzegovina had a population of just 346,859, making it one of the smallest major cities globally.

name: Clean Pockets
title: Minimal Corruption in Business
description: In 2023, only 0.1% of firms reported making informal payments to public officials, indicating a low level of corruption in business practices.

name: Air Freight? What's That?
title: Negligible Air Freight Activity
description: In 2015, Bosnia and Herzegovina recorded just 0.000087 million ton-km in air freight, highlighting minimal air transport activity.

name: Healthcare Safety Net
title: Minimal Health Expenditure Poverty Impact
description: In 2015, only 0.01% of the population was pushed below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care expenses, showcasing a robust healthcare safety net.

name: Golden Years for Women
title: High Proportion of Elderly Women
description: In 2023, 7.69% of the female population in Bosnia and Herzegovina was aged 65-69, indicating a significant elderly female demographic.
